title: New interface - recently played / match history link
body:
It is not as easy to see folks from the "recently played" list, or at least I cant find it in the new interface. Is it still there?

Also in match history your team mates profiles were hyperlinked to you could click through and check how they play generally.

Are these features still available?

replies.body: Is there an official place to talk about the interface? I reckon there are some real steps down from the old client in terms of functionality and it would be good to flesh them out before it moves out of beta.
Not being able to right click and invite from your clans is a bit shit too.
